trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SEQ_00<tab>Seigetsu the Enlightened hopes to enlist the aid of ancient Namazu spirits.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Namazu steward.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SEQ_02<tab>You have spoken with the Namazu steward. Deliver the requested supplies to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Namazu steward.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_000<tab><var 1A 02 /var>The Chrysanthemum and the Dango<var 1A 01 /var> describes a Hingan ritual in which the spirits of their ancestors are beckoned into the home to ensure a bountiful harvest.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_001<tab>We will perform these selfsame rites here in Dhoro Iloh. Should the souls of our forebears answer the call, their divine protection may prove instrumental in averting our impending doom.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_002<tab>One of the Seven Hundred Seventy-Seven is searching the plains for the necessary offerings. As this was not originally a custom of the Namazu, there may be matters best handled by someone with...hands. Think of it as another opportunity to prove your usefulness!
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_010<tab>Did Gyofun...I mean, Seigetsu the Enlightened send you? I'm so inundated with tasks, I can't possibly manage them alone. I need your help!
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_011<tab>We need traditional serving trays to present the food for the kami! Please, look inside that crate and see if there's anything you can use!
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_012<tab>We need a traditional serving mat to present the offerings! Please, look inside that crate and see if there's anything you can use!
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_013<tab>We need traditional delicacies to present as offerings! Please, look inside that crate and see if there's anything you can use!

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_014<tab>I was told to gather steppe clay for making traditional Hingan crockery. You'll go and get some for me, won't you? Try searching a little south of Chakha Zoh. Yes, yes.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_015<tab>I was told to gather ingredients for traditional Hingan dishes, but I can't find any edible buds! I heard they grow south of Chakha Zoh, but I couldn't find any for the life of me. Perhaps you will have better luck. Yes, yes.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_016<tab>We need a steppe sweetfish, the centerpiece of the offerings! Could you catch one from Tao Khaal? Apparently, they are drawn to the smell of salmon roe. Yes, yes.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_017<tab>When you're done, please go straight to Seigetsu. He is insistent that he is the only one capable of arranging the offerings as tradition dictates. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_018<tab>Did you have a mishap? Not to worry, there are more materials in the crate.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_019<tab>Did you have a mishap? Not to worry, there are more materials in the crate.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_020<tab>So the delicacy didn't turn out as well as you'd hoped? Not to worry, there are more ingredients in the crate.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_028<tab>You can't find any steppe clay? Try looking south of Chakha Zoh.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_029<tab>You can't find any edible buds? Try looking south of Chakha Zoh.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_030<tab>Are the steppe sweetfish eluding you? There should be plenty in Tao Khaal. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_DAILYNAMAZUO03111_000_031<tab>You've done ever so well! I'm sure Seigetsu will approve. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_040<tab>Do you have something to present to me?

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_041<tab>Let me see... Yes, yes, perfectly adequate. Once the offerings have been suitably blessed and arranged, all that will remain is to perform the ritual itself.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_042<tab>Part of the ceremony involves enacting a banquet as though our long-dead ancestors are corporeally present. The process is extremely lengthy and involves chanting in an ancient Hingan tongue.

TEXT_BANNAM403_03111_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_043<tab>I dare not entrust such a delicate task to any of my Namazu brethren, who would no doubt botch the incantations and leave us all cursed to eternal damnation.
